# **About me**

My name is Christian. I am a physicist and statistician from the University of Oviedo and the University of Santiago de Compostela. I've always been fascinated by math but it was by doing my final year project when I became interested in the world of statistics and machine learning.

## Knowledge


1. Programming: R (advanced), Python (intermediate), MATLAB (intermediate), C (basic), SQL (basic).

2. knowledge of TensorFlow, keras, numpy, matplotlib, pandas ...

3. Operating systems: Linux and Windows

4. Mastery of time series models, functional data, multivariate analysis, survival analysis, mixed models, machine learning, deep learning, data mining.

5. Knowledge forming generative adversarial networks and notions of reinforcement learning.
